src:
10月車市重回4萬台 Toyota銷售最亮麗
01 Nov 2019, 19:36 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, 中央通訊社
受到9月底颱風假、買氣遞延影響，台灣10月車市銷售表現出乎意料，單月達4.1萬台、月增24.9%、年增17.1%，其中，龍頭豐田（Toyota）單月大賣1萬4179台最為凸出。中央社製圖 108年11月1日
text:
In October, the auto market returned to 40,000 units. Toyota’s sales were the brightest.
01 Nov 2019, 19:36 by https://www.facebook.com/cnanewstaiwan, Central News Agency
Due to the typhoon and the delay in buying gas at the end of September, Taiwan’s auto sales performance in October was unexpected, with 41,000 units in a single month, a 24.9% increase in the month and an annual increase of 17.1%. Among them, the Toyota Toyota sold in a single month. The 14,000 4179 units are the most prominent. Central Society Charting November 1, 108
